name: Fight the crypto
description:
CLICK E TO OPEN DOORS

The year is 2050. The machines have started to take over the humans place as apex predators, but one thing stands in the machines' way. Crypto miners. The world's scummiest scums. Their crypto mining has started to consume so much power that the world soon will end, if you don't help.

Your job is to kill the crypto miners and then find their server before the time runs out. You will have a representative of the Ai community with you as a companion on your quest. His special ability can be used by clicking Q.

The game is an FPS with a low poly art style
